verified.description: Indicates if the user identity is verified.

primary.description: Indicates if the user identity is the user's primary.

type.description: The type of user identity (e.g. email).

user_id.description: The ID of the user the identity belongs to.

id.description: Unique identifier for the user identity.

created_at.description: The datetime when the user identity was created.

updated_at.description: The datetime when the user identity was updated.
